articles.title: LIV Golf: Scottie Scheffler walks directly across rumored rebel Cameron Smith's line - Daily Mail

articles.content:

articles.description: Sportsmail have looked at the weird and wonderful training methods Oleksandr Usyk uses. Looking at everything from cold water immersion to sand training...
articles.content:
